review: Pretty disenchanted with what AppleTV provides for a supposed straming player. In typical Apple-fashion, it requires an iTunes account to access video in the cloud. AppleTV cannot access your UltraViolet library to access outside iTunes.Compared to other streaming video players, AppleTV is extremely limited. It is like comparing Windows phones to iPhones, but in reverse. AppleTV has a limited number of applications for viewing videos.Netflix is available and is one of the few apps that function at a 1.5 Mbps connection. Videos from iTunes DO NOT stream, they automatically attempt to download.I purchased this device for my wife believing it was of the same quality as a Roku. I was wrong, the 2nd generation Roku outperforms AppleTV.
author: Rick

review: We purchased this apple tv box for our HD tv in our family room.  We use it all the time.  It does require that you have Internet capabilities on your tv (which most newer tvs already have).  We own several apple products and we are able to sync up our music, photos, Netflix, and Youtube accounts for tv viewing/listening.  We do still have a cable box too and we switch back and forth between the two.  We find ourselves using Netflix the most for children's tv programs and movies.  For the price, this has been a great buy.  I would buy it again.

review: This is a good product that just keeps getting better with more content updated all the time.  I am about to cancel my cable bill because I rarely stray away from my Apple box.  If you want the local news or watch regular TV then it is a great enhancement for movies but if you are like me and don't watch the networks this is for you.  I use NetFlix and Hulu Plus and can watch pretty much whatever I want that was worth seeing on regular TV.
